text: WRFS (105.1 FM) is a radio station licensed to serve the community of Rockford, Alabama. The station is owned by Marble City Media, LLC and airs a classic hits format. The station was assigned the WRFS call letters by the Federal Communications Commission on January 22, 2014. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * RFS (FM) Category:Radio stations established in 2015 Category:2015 establishments in Alabama Category:Classic hits radio stations in the United States Category:Coosa County, Alabama
title: WRFS (FM)
